Introduction

Leia is a Brazilian-Japanese singer under DR Music. She is a former member of the girl groups BLACKSWAN and RaNia.

In August 2019, Leia (then known as Larissa) was introduced as a member of RaNia in an announcement video for their upcoming appearance at a K-pop concert in Romania.

On July 3, 2020, she was announced as a member of the upcoming girl group BLACKSWAN. The group debuted on October 16, with the studio album Goodbye RANIA.

On November 9, 2022, DR Music confirmed that Leia went on hiatus due to health concerns. It is assumed that she has silently departed from BLACKSWAN since.
